name: Banickate's Basics: The 6 Maps! Versions RE-UPLOADED Collection
name_original: Banickate's Basics: The 6 Maps! Versions RE-UPLOADED Collection
description:
Main Headline! A New Character is here!

Before the events of Map 1, The Brother was in charge of the studio, until he decided to leave the group because he was annoyed by the amount of random noises and chaos there is...  And the crew has to pick a new person to be in charge of the Studio... Then they met someone named Banickate who has the power to teleport about 10 frames in front of him and has experience of being in charge of another studio, they decided to hire him into the studio! They got used to the new man in charge, and he decided to create many maps with many themes and contraptions! Requiring you to collect different things to leave a building! You normally have to do 6 maps, but you can also enjoy 2 side maps: Parakeet's Guide!

It's Still Baldi's Basics...

Using the Open Source Baldi Project, the original code is still intact! When you get a math problem wrong, Everyone becomes activated! Also, Arts and Crafters was deleted due to bugs, and was replaced by a different-functioning BEANS!

Links!

GameBanana: https://gamebanana.com/wips/51586 GameJolt: https://gamejolt.com/games/banickates-basics-the-6-maps/496381

For Modding this:

This is free to mod as long as you credit me! I SEE YOU THIEVES!

Controls

Same as the Original Baldi, but has the map when you press TAB, and the Advanced Map when you press M
